name: Clone - Chaos Factory
description:
Hello.

This is an unstable prototype of Chaos Factory - The Escape made in 2019.

This is a student project made while learning Unity.

Game and assets made by Nikola Vojinovic, music by Milos Jevtic

CONTROLS:

ARROWS - Move

L.-CTRL - Shoot

SPACE - Jump

ALT+F4 - Exit Game

WARNING:

Prototype has no pause, it has autosaving but just cycling levels,

it is impossible to delete saved progress

unless you enter - C:\Users\name\AppData\LocalLow\Distol - folder

(on some machines it is possible to delete saved progress with F10)
